scripts.build:bifold: cd bifold/core && npm run typecheck && npm run prepack
scripts.build:app: cd app && npm run typecheck && npm run prepack --if-present
scripts.lint: cd app && npm run lint --if-present && cd ../bifold/core && npm run lint --if-present
scripts.prettier: cd app && npm run prettier --if-present && cd ../bifold/core && npm run prettier --if-present
scripts.test: npm run test:app && npm run test:bifold
